name: Beet Busters
description:
A cursed beetroot tries to corrupt a lonely farmers most price possession! In this local asymmetrical multiplayer game one player plays as the farmer trying to defend their pumpkins, while the Cursed Beetroot tries to spread its corruption all over the farm!

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023.

Download the package and extract in a folder. Press the Executable to play :)

Controls

Farmer
Move   -   w,a,s,d
Attack  -   Spacebar

Beetroot
Move               -  i,j,k,l
Bury/Unbury  -  Right shift
Toggle HUD    -  Right Control

Credits

Lotta Andriesse - Programming and Art
Marcel de Boer - 3D Art
Lina Maldeikyte - 2D Art
Igli Milaqi - Programmer
Jori Kamp - Game Design and Audio
